title: Create, Modify Mozenda Agents
snippet:
We are looking for someone that has expertise in setting up the Mozenda agents we need to handle the data scraping or data extraction. A few agents have been set up successfully and are running, but we would like to set up several new agents, schedule them, and ensure that they are running properly. We also need some minor modifications to a few other agents. When bidding, please answer the following questions:

1. Do you have experience building Mozenda agents?
2. Can you modify existing agents successfully?
3. How quickly can you perform the work? We are looking for someone that can handle several agents in a few weeks. Thank you.

Thanks!
